problems.Title: Easy
problems.Description:
Write a function in python which takes as input a list of integers and returns the largest one, without using the buitin max() function.

Examples:

Input : [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
Output : 5

Input : [-1, 19, 6, 19, 6, 6]
Output : 19

problems.Title: Medium
problems.Description:
Given a list, write a Python program to swap first and last element of the list.

Examples:

Input : [12, 35, 9, 56, 24]
Output : [24, 35, 9, 56, 12]

Input : [1, 2, 3]
Output : [3, 2, 1]

problems.Title: Difficult
problems.Description:
Given a list, write a Python program to swap first and last element of the list.

Examples:

Input : [12, 35, 9, 56, 24]
Output : [24, 35, 9, 56, 12]

Input : [1, 2, 3]
Output : [3, 2, 1]
